summary.span: 介绍矩形和路径组成的图形形状的内部。

span.span: Describes the interior of a graphics shape composed of rectangles and paths.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 区域是可缩放的因为其坐标指定世界坐标中。A region is scalable because its coordinates are specified in world coordinates. 但是，在绘图图面，其内部是依赖于的大小和形状表示它的像素的。On a drawing surface, however, its interior is dependent on the size and shape of the pixels representing it. 应用程序可以使用区域剪裁的绘制操作的输出。An application can use regions to clip the output of drawing operations. 这些区域称为剪辑区域。These regions are called clipping regions. 使用剪辑区域的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 与区域使用剪辑](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-clipping-with-a-region.md)。For more information on using regions for clipping, see [How to: Use Clipping with a Region](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-clipping-with-a-region.md). 应用程序还可以使用中的命中测试的操作，例如检查点或矩形是否与某个区域相交的区域。An application can also use regions in hit-testing operations, such as checking whether a point or a rectangle intersects a region. 使用区域的命中测试的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用命中测试区域](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-hit-testing-with-a-region.md)。For more information on using regions for hit-testing, see [How to: Use Hit Testing with a Region](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-hit-testing-with-a-region.md). 应用程序可以通过使用填充区域方法和一个对象。An application can fill a region by using the method and a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 代码示例演示如何使用从一个对象，以设置的另一个。The code example demonstrates how to use the from one object to set the for another . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#13)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕以黑色。Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in black. - 创建与第一个相交，并将其绘制到屏幕以红色的第二个矩形。Creates a second rectangle that intersects with the first and draws it to the screen in red. - 创建使用的第一个矩形的区域。Creates a region using the first rectangle. - 创建，并向其添加第二个矩形。Creates a , and adds the second rectangle to it. - 获取与结合使用时的区域的求补。Gets the complement of the region when combined with the . - 用蓝色填充补充区域并将其绘制到屏幕。Fills the complement area with blue and draws it to the screen. 请注意，区域不相交的该区域的颜色为蓝色。Notice that the area of the that does not intersect with the region is colored blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕以黑色。Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in black. - 创建与第一个相交，并将其绘制到屏幕以红色的第二个矩形。Creates a second rectangle that intersects with the first and draws it to the screen in red. - 创建使用的第一个矩形的区域。Creates a region using the first rectangle. - 获取与第二个矩形结合使用该区域的求补。Gets the complement of that region combined with the second rectangle. - 用蓝色填充补充区域并将其绘制到屏幕。Fills the complement area with blue and draws it to the screen. 请注意的区域与区域不相交的第二个矩形的颜色为蓝色。Notice that the area of the second rectangle that does not intersect with the region is colored blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕以黑色Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in black - 创建与第一个相交，并将其绘制到屏幕以红色的第二个矩形。Creates a second rectangle that intersects with the first and draws it to the screen in red. - 创建一个使用的第一个矩形的区域，并创建第二个区域使用第二个矩形。Creates one region using the first rectangle and creates a second region using the second rectangle. - 获取与第二个区域结合使用时的第一个区域的求补。Gets the complement of that first region when combined with the second region. - 用蓝色填充补充区域并将其绘制到屏幕。Fills the complement area with blue and draws it to the screen. 请注意，与第一个区域不相交的第二个区域的区域颜色为蓝色。Notice that the area of the second region that does not intersect with the first region is colored blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 释放此 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用允许使用的资源重新分配用于其他目的。Calling allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示构造函数和和方法。The following code example demonstrates the constructor and the and methods. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`FillRegionExcludingPath`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `FillRegionExcludingPath` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.GraphicsProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.GraphicsProperties/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.GraphicsProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.GraphicsProperties/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.GraphicsProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.GraphicsProperties/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: A structure that represents the bounding rectangle for this on the specified drawing surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前转换的图形上下文用于计算区域内部绘图图面上。The current transformation of the graphics context is used to compute the region interior on the drawing surface. 边界矩形并不总是的最小可能边框，具体取决于当前的变换。The bounding rectangle is not always the smallest possible bounding rectangle depending on the current transformation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建并向其添加一个椭圆。Creates a and adds an ellipse to it. - 用蓝色填充路径并将其绘制到屏幕。Fills the path with blue and draws it to the screen. - 创建使用的区域。Creates a region that uses the . - 获取未排除的区域的区域与第二个矩形结合使用时。Gets the nonexcluded area of the region when combined with the second rectangle. - 获取区域的边框，并将其绘制到屏幕以红色。Gets the bounding rectangle for the region and draws it to the screen in red. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许你定义的自定义形状。The class allows you to define a custom shape. 形状可以组成线条、 多边形和曲线。The shape can be made up of lines, polygons, and curves. 描述包含在此形状。 describes the shape contained in this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 代码示例演示如何使用从一个对象，以设置的另一个。The code example demonstrates how to use the from one object to set the for another . remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建第一个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕以黑色。Creates the first rectangle and draws it to the screen in black. - 创建第二个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕以红色。Creates the second rectangle and draws it to the screen in red. - 创建从第一个矩形区域。Creates a region from the first rectangle. - 获取与第二个矩形结合使用时的区域的交集的区域。Gets the area of intersection for the region when combined with the second rectangle. - 填充带蓝色的交集的区域，并将其绘制到屏幕。Fills the area of intersection with blue and draws it to the screen. 请注意，只有在区域的重叠的区域和矩形将显示为蓝色。Notice that only the overlapped area for the region and rectangle is blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建第一个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕上显示为蓝色。Creates the first rectangle and draws it to the screen in blue. - 创建第二个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕以红色。Creates the second rectangle and draws it to the screen in red. - 创建从第一个矩形区域。Creates a region from the first rectangle. - 确定是否与该区域相交的矩形有任何部分。Determines if any portion of the rectangle intersects with the region. - 显示`true`或`false`在屏幕上的结果。Displays the `true` or `false` result on the screen. 请注意，矩形相交区域，因此结果是`true`。Notice that the rectangle intersects the region, so the result is `true`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MakeEmpty() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化此为一个空内部。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor and method. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个窗体并将以下代码粘贴到其中。Create a form and paste the following code into it. 调用`FillEmptyRegion`在该窗体事件处理方法，传递`e`作为。Call the `FillEmptyRegion` method in the form's event-handling method, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕上显示为蓝色。Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in blue. - 通过将矩形中创建一个区域。Creates a region from the rectangle. - 创建一个转换矩阵，并将其设置为 45 度。Creates a transformation matrix and sets it to 45 degrees. - 将转换应用到该区域。Applies the transformation to the region. - 有一个红色填充已转换的区域并将转换后的区域绘制到屏幕以红色。Fills the transformed region with red and draws the transformed region to the screen in red. 请注意，红色矩形是通过原始矩形，以蓝色显示旋转 45 度。Notice that the red rectangle is rotated 45 degrees from the original rectangle, shown in blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕上显示为蓝色。Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in blue. - 通过将矩形中创建一个区域。Creates a region from the rectangle. - 适用于区域的转换。Applies the translation to the region. - 有一个红色填充已翻译的区域，并将已翻译的区域绘制到屏幕以红色。Fills the translated region with red and draws the translated region to the screen in red. 请注意，红色矩形会转移下拉并从原始矩形右侧显示为蓝色。Notice that the red rectangle is shifted down and to the right from the original rectangle, shown in blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建第一个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕以黑色。Creates the first rectangle and draws it to the screen in black. - 创建第二个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕以红色。Creates a second rectangle and draws it to the screen in red. - 创建使用的第一个矩形的区域。Creates a region using the first rectangle. - 获取有关联合的区域`myRegion`与结合使用时`complementRect`。Gets the area of union for `myRegion` when combined with `complementRect`. - 用蓝色填充填充联合的区域，并将其绘制到屏幕。Fills the fills the area of union with blue and draws it to the screen. 请注意，这两个矩形都用蓝色，其中包括重叠的区域填充。Notice that both rectangles are filled with blue, including the area of overlap. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建第一个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕以黑色。Creates the first rectangle and draws it to the screen in black. - 创建第二个矩形，并将其绘制到屏幕以红色。Creates a second rectangle and draws it to the screen in red. - 创建使用的第一个矩形的区域。Creates a region using the first rectangle. - 获取区域`myRegion`与结合使用时`complementRect`。Gets the area for `myRegion` when combined with `complementRect`. - 填充用蓝色区域并将其绘制到屏幕。Fills the area with blue and draws it to the screen. 请注意，这两个矩形将填入蓝色，重叠区域除外。Notice that both rectangles are filled with blue, except for the area of overlap.
